changelog: Fixed Autotracking not getting the right Itemsanity settings
Added support for Split Itemsanity
Added Options to set completion checks for each level individually
Fixed Dubai staying active when connecting to a slot with dubai deactive
When Level is disabled, also hide the completion checks in the level tab
Changed layout of Carpathian Mountains All Maps to stack them vertically
Moved some maps to be displayed in two rows
Fixed a check not updating its color when collected
Made settings readable
Also applied settings changes to Overview-only variant
Only show enabled Levels in Overview
Added Maps without checks for completions sake
Sorted Overview entries and fixed typos in original dataset
Fixed issues with the "Fusil G1-4/C" having a "/" in it's name
Fixed Carpathian Mountains Loactions not using the correct offset for each, map
Added support for master-difficulty logic
Added an overview-only variant which should be more performant
Seperated accessibily checks per map.
Spedup launch by not forcing poptracker to rename duplicates
Bring Item Ids inline with current apworld version
Added overview page to show all checks on one map
fixed auto-updates not working
removed unneeded .svg images from download
initial relrease
